tool_description: Analyzes legal documents to identify potentially privileged content including attorney-client communications, work product, and other protected materials using legal-specific pattern recognition.

document_text.description: Full document text to analyze for privileged content

privilege_types.description: Types of privilege to detect in the document

law_firm_names.description: Known law firm names to improve privilege detection accuracy

attorney_names.description: Known attorney names for privilege relationship identification

client_names.description: Client names to identify privileged communications

detection_sensitivity.description: Detection sensitivity level: low, medium, high

include_metadata_analysis.description: Whether to analyze document metadata for privilege indicators

flag_partial_privilege.description: Whether to flag documents with potentially privileged portions

error_messages: Document text insufficient: Document must contain at least 100 words for reliable privilege analysis.
Invalid privilege types: All privilege_types must be from the supported privilege categories.
Detection sensitivity invalid: Use one of [low, medium, high] for detection_sensitivity parameter.
Entity names invalid: Law firm, attorney, and client names must be non-empty strings if provided.
usage: Provide document_text for privilege analysis. Specify privilege_types to focus on specific categories, add known law_firm_names, attorney_names, and client_names for better accuracy, and configure detection_sensitivity and other options based on review requirements.

privilege_detected.description: Whether any privileged content was identified in the document

privilege_types_found.description: Types of privilege detected in the document

confidence_score.description: Overall confidence score (0-100) for privilege detection

privileged_segments.description: Text segments identified as potentially privileged

recommendation.description: Recommended action: produce, redact, or manual_review
